author: Jaspar Eyears
description: Jaspar recommends making a batch in their glasses and refreezing them with the straws already in the glass, like the old colonels and their julep freezers in Kentucky.
name: Hornitos Lau
recipeIngredient: 37.5 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) drink and add more crushed ice so drink fills glass
